decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (1A, received 23 July 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the north-western facing wall of the roof extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 7:30am to 06:00pm            on Mondays to Friday and 08:00am to 01:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the ground floor flat
